text: I see drag and drop sections are valid for blog listing templates, but not blog post templates. Is there a way to enable/opt in to this, or is it just not possible currently/ever?

We’re looking at what it would take to support it in blog posts as well but it’s currently not possible. Blog posts have a unique set of problems like being able to easily import/export RSS feeds, RSS emails etc. All of which require some extra thought, where listing pages did not.
